name: To The Beat VR
description:
To The Beat VR is made to get you moving around in whatever room space you have.

This game is developed for VR and HTC Vive only currently. Plans to branch out into other VR are yet unknown.

The game is made for a space of at least 1.25 m(L) by 2.5 m(W)

Still in development.

This update includes the support for any song you want to play! Provided you have the mp3 or wav file, you can take any song for a run!

Thank you so much! Also, if you would like to donate, I would very much appreciate it.
